Which of the following are used as tool for the Liquidity adjustment facility (LAF)?
  1. Repo Rate
  2. Reverse Repo Rate
  3. Cash Reserve Ratio
  4. Statutory liquidity ratio
Select the correct option from codes given below:
explanation: Liquidity adjustment facility (LAF) is a monetary policy tool which allows banks to borrow money through repurchase agreements. It consists of Rep and Reverse Repo Rate.
